oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-12-22 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from December 22, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), George Morgan (host/performer), guest performers Rita Faye and the Anita Kerr Singers, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, the Jordanaires, Minnie Pearl, Chet Atkins, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chet Atkins; Minnie Pearl; Rod Brasfield; Jordanaires; Anita Kerr Singers; Grandpa Jones; George Morgan
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: George Morgan introduces Chet Atkins -- Rudolph The Red-Nosed Reindeer (Chet Atkins) -- George Morgan introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, George Morgan, Rod Brasfield) -- George Morgan introduces the Jordanaires -- Deck The Halls (Jordanaires, Anita Kerr Singers) -- George Morgan introduces Grandpa Jones -- Jingle Bells (Grandpa Jones) -- George Morgan talks -- O Little Town Of Bethlehem (George Morgan) -- Closing statement (George Morgan) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jordanaires (Musical group); Kirkham, Millie; Anita Kerr Singers; Morgan, George, 1925-1975; Faye, Rita, 1944-
